description.zh-cn: 主校区位于中国上海市浦东新区张江高科技园区的一所以理工科为主的公立普通高等学校，由上海市人民政府和中国科学院共同举办、建设，由上海市人民政府主管。该大学亦是中国“双一流”建设高校。
description.en: A public research university with a focus on science and technology, its main campus is located in Zhangjiang Hi-Tech Park, Pudong, Shanghai, China. It was jointly established and built by the Shanghai Municipal People's Government and the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and is supervised by the Shanghai Municipal People's Government. The university is also part of China's 'Double First Class' initiative.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学家，上海科技大学现任校长。
description.en: Chinese scientist, current President of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学家和政治人物，上海科技大学首任校长，现任校务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese scientist and political figure, the first President of ShanghaiTech University and current Chairman of its University Council.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的最高行政机关，是上海科技大学的共同创办者和主管单位。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Shanghai, it is the co-founder and supervising authority of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在科学技术方面的最高学术机构，是上海科技大学的共同创办者。
description.en: The highest academic institution in science and technology in the People's Republic of China, and a co-founder of ShanghaiTech University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门，批准了上海科技大学的建立。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work, which approved the establishment of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一项关于提升高等教育质量的国家战略，旨在建设一批世界一流大学和一流学科。
description.en: A national strategy of the People's Republic of China to enhance the quality of higher education by developing a group of world-class universities and first-class disciplines.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，现任上海科技大学党委书记、副校长。
description.en: Chinese physicist, current Party Secretary and Vice President of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，曾任上海科技大学首任党委书记，现任副校长。
description.en: Chinese physicist, former first Party Secretary and current Vice President of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学副校长兼教务长。
description.en: Vice President and Provost of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学副校长。
description.en: Vice President of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国数学家，上海科技大学副校长。
description.en: Chinese mathematician, Vice President of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市委书记，期间赴上海科技大学调研。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Shanghai, who visited and inspected ShanghaiTech University during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理，期间考察上海科技大学。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Vice Premier of the State Council, who inspected ShanghaiTech University during her term.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席，曾考察上海科技大学。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, who once inspected ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任上海市委书记，期间赴上海科技大学调研。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Party Secretary of Shanghai, who visited and inspected ShanghaiTech University during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，国家最高科学技术奖获得者，曾作为特邀嘉宾出席上海科技大学毕业典礼并作主旨演讲。
description.en: Chinese physicist and recipient of the State Preeminent Science and Technology Award, who attended the ShanghaiTech University graduation ceremony as a special guest and delivered a keynote speech.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、科学家，上海科技大学校务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician and scientist, Chairman of the University Council of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国经济学家，上海科技大学校务委员会委员，并曾在学校进行讲座。
description.en: Chinese economist, a member of the University Council of ShanghaiTech University, and has given a lecture at the university.

description.zh-cn: 中国地质学家，上海科技大学校务委员会委员。
description.en: Chinese geologist, a member of the University Council of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，上海科技大学校务委员会委员。
description.en: Chinese politician, a member of the University Council of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，上海科技大学校务委员会委员。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, a member of the University Council of ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔化学家，上海科技大学物质科学与技术学院创始院长。
description.en: Chinese-American chemist, the founding Dean of the School of Physical Science and Technology at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，上海科技大学信息科学与技术学院创始院长。
description.en: Taiwanese entrepreneur, the founding Dean of the School of Information Science and Technology at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔生物学家，上海科技大学生命科学与技术学院创始院长。
description.en: Chinese-American biologist, the founding Dean of the School of Life Science and Technology at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，上海科技大学创意与艺术学院创始院长。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, the founding Dean of the School of Creativity and Art at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 经济学家，上海科技大学创业与管理学院院长。
description.en: Economist, Dean of the School of Entrepreneurship and Management at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学创业与管理学院助理院长。
description.en: Assistant Dean of the School of Entrepreneurship and Management at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学生物医学工程学院创始院长。
description.en: Founding Dean of the School of Biomedical Engineering at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美国化学家，上海科技大学免疫化学研究所所长。
description.en: American chemist, Director of the Shanghai Institute for Advanced Immunochemical Studies at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美国结构生物学家，上海科技大学iHuman研究所所长。
description.en: American structural biologist, Director of the iHuman Institute at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 数学家，上海科技大学数学科学研究所创始所长。
description.en: Mathematician, founding Director of the Institute of Mathematical Sciences at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国哲学家，上海科技大学人文科学研究院院长。
description.en: Chinese philosopher, Dean of the Institute of Humanities at ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州的私立研究型大学，与上海科技大学有合作关系。
description.en: A private research university in California, USA, which has a partnership with ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美国伊利诺伊州的私立研究型大学，与上海科技大学签署有合作协议和合作备忘录。
description.en: A private research university in Illinois, USA, which has signed a cooperation agreement and a memorandum of understanding with ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美国加利福尼亚州的公立研究型大学，与上海科技大学签署有合作协议。
description.en: A public research university in California, USA, which has signed a cooperation agreement with ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 美国马萨诸塞州的私立研究型大学，与上海科技大学开展本科生交换项目。
description.en: A private research university in Massachusetts, USA, which conducts an undergraduate exchange program with ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 上海市人民政府和中国科学院共同举办、建设上海科技大学。
description.en: The Shanghai Municipal People's Government and the Chinese Academy of Sciences jointly established and built ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院和上海市人民政府共同举办、建设上海科技大学。
description.en: The Chinese Academy of Sciences and the Shanghai Municipal People's Government jointly established and built ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学由上海市人民政府主管。
description.en: ShanghaiTech University is supervised by the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 教育部于2012年4月28日发函同意筹建上海科技大学，并于2013年9月30日批准同意正式建立。
description.en: The Ministry of Education issued a letter on April 28, 2012, agreeing to the preparatory establishment of ShanghaiTech University, and approved its formal establishment on September 30, 2013.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学是中国“双一流”建设高校之一。
description.en: ShanghaiTech University is one of China's 'Double First Class' initiative universities.

description.zh-cn: 江绵恒于2014年2月至2024年6月担任上海科技大学首任校长。
description.en: Jiang Mianheng served as the first President of ShanghaiTech University from February 2014 to June 2024.

description.zh-cn: 封东来于2024年6月起担任上海科技大学校长。
description.en: Feng Donglai has been serving as the President of ShanghaiTech University since June 2024.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央政治局委员、上海市委书记韩正赴上海科技大学调研。
description.en: Han Zheng, then a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Shanghai, inspected ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央政治局委员、国务院副总理刘延东考察了上海科技大学。
description.en: Liu Yandong, then a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council, inspected ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席江泽民考察了上海科技大学。
description.en: Jiang Zemin, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, inspected ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局委员、上海市委书记李强一行调研上海科技大学。
description.en: Li Qiang, a member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Party Secretary of Shanghai, inspected ShanghaiTech University.

description.zh-cn: 作为特邀嘉宾出席上海科技大学2018届毕业典礼并作主旨演讲。
description.en: Attended the 2018 graduation ceremony of ShanghaiTech University as a special guest and delivered a keynote speech.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学创意与艺术学院开设与南加州大学合作的影视制作类非学历课程。
description.en: The School of Creativity and Art at ShanghaiTech University offers non-degree film production courses in collaboration with the University of Southern California.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学与芝加哥大学签署了合作协议与合作备忘录。
description.en: ShanghaiTech University has signed a cooperation agreement and a memorandum of understanding with the University of Chicago.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学与加州大学伯克利分校签署了合作协议。
description.en: ShanghaiTech University has signed a cooperation agreement with the University of California, Berkeley.

description.zh-cn: 上海科技大学与麻省理工学院开展本科生交换项目。
description.en: ShanghaiTech University conducts an undergraduate exchange program with the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
